snippet: Jobs data shored up stock markets as investors breathed sighs of relief that the economy appeared stronger than recent growth figures had suggested....
abstract: Stocks climb to record highs in wake of vigorous July jobs report.
lead_paragraph: Jobs data shored up stock markets as investors breathed sighs of relief that the economy appeared stronger than recent growth figures had suggested.

headline.main: Wall St. Ends Higher on Strong Jobs Report
headline.print_headline: Wall St. Ends Higher on Strong Jobs Report
